entities.name: SMITH
entities.description: Mr. Smith was appointed President and Chief Legal Officer in September 2015. He served as Executive Vice President, General Counsel, and Secretary from 2011 to 2015, and served as Senior Vice President, General Counsel, and Secretary from 2001 to 2011. Mr. Smith was also named Chief Compliance Officer in 2002. Since joining Microsoft in 1993, he was Deputy General Counsel for Worldwide Sales and previously was responsible for managing the European Law and Corporate Affairs Group, based in Paris. Mr. Smith also serves on the Board of Directors of Netflix, Inc.

entities.name: YOUNG
entities.description: Mr. Young joined Microsoft in November 2020 as Executive Vice President, Business Development, Strategy, and Ventures. Prior to Microsoft, he served as the Chief Executive Officer of McAfee, LLC from 2017 to 2020, and served as a Senior Vice President and General Manager of Intel Security Group from 2014 until 2017, when he led the initiative to spin out McAfee into a standalone company. Mr. Young also serves on the Board of Directors of American Express Company.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a global technology company offering various products and services, with a presence in multiple markets. They provide investor information through their website and have a Corporate Social Responsibility program.

entities.name: NETFLIX, INC.
entities.description: Netflix, Inc. is a streaming service provider where Mr. Smith serves on the Board of Directors.

entities.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS COMPANY
entities.description: American Express Company is a multinational financial services corporation where Mr. Young serves on the Board of Directors.

entities.name: MCAFEE, LLC
entities.description: McAfee, LLC is a cybersecurity company where Mr. Young served as the Chief Executive Officer from 2017 to 2020.

entities.name: INTEL SECURITY GROUP
entities.description: Intel Security Group is a division within Intel Corporation where Mr. Young served as Senior Vice President and General Manager from 2014 until 2017.

relationships.relationship_description: Mr. Smith has held various leadership roles at Microsoft since joining in 1993, including President and Chief Legal Officer, Executive Vice President, General Counsel, and Secretary, and Deputy General Counsel for Worldwide Sales.
Mr. Smith serves on the Board of Directors of Netflix, Inc.
Mr. Young joined Microsoft in November 2020 as Executive Vice President, Business Development, Strategy, and Ventures.
Mr. Young served as the Chief Executive Officer of McAfee, LLC from 2017 to 2020.
Mr. Young serves on the Board of Directors of American Express Company.
Mr. Young served as Senior Vice President and General Manager of Intel Security Group from 2014 until 2017.
